Name: Banana Colada
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of banana chunk (cut garnish from centre of banana and place the rest in the blender to make the cocktail).
BLEND all ingredients with 1.5 x 7oz scoops of crushed ice.
Garnish with banana chunk on rim.
Review: Don't skimp, use a whole banana per drink for real flavour.
History: See our main Piña Colada page for the story behind the classic and for links to numerous other variations.
